item.title: RGC Contractors
item.description: RGC contractors enjoys a rich and diversified work force employing a multi-cultured professional team of various backgrounds. Our team of professionals are always enjoying their skills, know how and craftmanship to attain the highest level in quality, safety and efficiency. We take pride in the work we do to achieve the goals and expectation of our clients.

item.description: To make sure that our clients get the best service they deserve, we do not only select high quality FF&E, but also we aquire these items from trusted supplierâ€™s equivalent to the best cost in the least possible time.
